levels.svg: <path d="M 189 810 L 202 267" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 202 267 L 107 116" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="189" cy="810" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="202" cy="267" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="107" cy="116" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the safest way to play the hole and leave yourself with at least a good chance to chip it in. Play it straight down the fairway and bounce over the bunker / rough. Use maximum topspin on whatever driver you use.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 228 695 L 215 313" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 215 313 L 244 134" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="228" cy="695" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="215" cy="313" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="244" cy="134" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 235 753 L 215 313" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 215 313 L 244 134" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="235" cy="753" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="215" cy="313" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="244" cy="134" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 243 813 L 215 313" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 215 313 L 244 134" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="243" cy="813" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="215" cy="313" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="244" cy="134" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is typically only an option from the first tee where you have a driver / ball combination that can carry you drive over the bunker. From the back tees you'll need some good tailwind. 2 bars of topspin should be good.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 228 695 C 163 413 163 413 197 250" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 197 250 L 241 128" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="228" cy="695" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="197" cy="250" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="241" cy="128" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 235 753 C 163 413 163 413 197 250" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 197 250 L 241 128" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="235" cy="753" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="197" cy="250" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="241" cy="128" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 243 813 C 163 413 163 413 197 250" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 197 250 L 241 128" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="243" cy="813" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="197" cy="250" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="241" cy="128" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: The typical way to play the hole. Bounce before the water to the second fairway. If you run into really bad headwind you'll have to layup before the water. For the second shot, go as close to the top as possible with no more than 6 bars of backspin. Any more than that and the ball will roll past the pin into the front rough.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 144 720 C 138 520 138 520 216 336" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 216 336 L 261 251" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 261 251 L 307 87" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="144" cy="720" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="216" cy="336" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="261" cy="251" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="307" cy="87" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 140 771 C 138 520 138 520 216 336" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 216 336 L 261 251" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 261 251 L 307 87" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="140" cy="771" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="216" cy="336" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="261" cy="251" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="307" cy="87" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 136 823 C 138 520 138 520 216 336" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 216 336 L 261 251" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 261 251 L 307 87" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="136" cy="823" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="216" cy="336" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="261" cy="251" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="307" cy="87" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is only an option with tailwind. A driver with a lot of topspin may even be able to reach the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 144 720 L 270 264" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 270 264 L 313 87" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="144" cy="720" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="270" cy="264" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="313" cy="87" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 140 771 L 270 264" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 270 264 L 313 87" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="140" cy="771" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="270" cy="264" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="313" cy="87" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 136 823 L 270 264" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 270 264 L 313 87" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="136" cy="823" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="270" cy="264" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="313" cy="87" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: With tailwind or a long enough driver this is the way to go to get to the green in two. Roll your drive out as far as possible. From there you can either bounce your second shot over the rough in front of the green or hit directly into the rough so it will roll out to the hole. This is not an easy eagle so a birdie is NOT a bad score.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 229 848 C 365 676 365 676 394 490" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 394 490 L 389 351" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 389 351 L 136 134" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="229" cy="848" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="394" cy="490" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="389" cy="351" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="136" cy="134" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 213 899 C 365 676 365 676 394 490" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 394 490 L 389 351" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 389 351 L 136 134" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="213" cy="899" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="394" cy="490" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="389" cy="351" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="136" cy="134" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 194 950 C 365 676 365 676 394 490" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 394 490 L 389 351" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 389 351 L 136 134" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="194" cy="950" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="394" cy="490" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="389" cy="351" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="136" cy="134" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: A tough option and very difficult to reach the green in two. With headwind or sidewind, layup short of the trees and play your second shot up close to the green. You'll have a wedge left to get your eagle.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 229 848 L 347 501" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 347 501 L 175 148" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 175 148 L 126 113" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="229" cy="848" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="347" cy="501" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="175" cy="148" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="126" cy="113" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

resources.title: Tour 7 Shootout - Wind Pointed at 9 O`clock

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a really, really hard Par 3. It's difficult to see in the picture that the fairway in front of the green slopes uphill and slopes right to left. This means you'll need to use sidespin to over adjust your shot so you always try to have a straight line for your ball when it hits the ground. Otherwise, you may find yourself in the rough. DO NOT use max backspin on this one. Use as little amount of spin as possible.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 156 599 L 143 207" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="156" cy="599" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="143" cy="207" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a very tough par 4 with a fairway that slopes severely from right to left so you'll need to use curl and sidespin to straighten out you drive once it hits the fairway. Landing in the rough or bunker on your drive will mean you won't reach the green in 2. For you second shot, go with the Guardian if it's level 4+. Go on the right side with curl and left sidespin. Use 3 - 4 bars of backspin and use the back of the fairway to make the ball fall nicely down to the green.

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is the more aggressive approach. Use the fairway in front of the green and use 6 - 7 bars of backspin to keep the ball on the green. You can also go directly on the green with max backspin and let the back of the green to roll the ball back down to the pin.

levels.name: Rookie

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: A pretty straight forward Par 3. You should keep in mind to hit the ball directly on the green. The fairway in front of the green is sloped uphill and leads to irregular bounces so avoid it.

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is one of the toughest par 5s in the game. Not likely to reach the green in 2 without a massive tailwind. Play your drive straight ahead as close to the rough as possible and basically do the same for your second shot. Your 3rd shot will require a small amount of curl and try to aim for the back of the green. There's a slope that will feed the ball down to the pin.

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: A trickier tee shot, but will give you a much better angle on your second shot to the left side of the next fairway. Landing as far left on that fairway will leave a much straighter and open shot to the green. Use the back of the green to draw the ball back down to the pin.

resources.title: Tour 11 - Left to right wind pointed at 2 O`clock

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the safest way to play the hole and leave yourself with at least a good chance to chip it in. Play it straight down the fairway and bounce over the bunker / rough. Use maximum topspin on whatever driver you use.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 160 609 L 196 263" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 196 263 L 244 117" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="160" cy="609" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="196" cy="263" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="244" cy="117" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is typically only an option from the first tee where you have a driver / ball combination that can carry you drive over the bunker. From the back tees you'll need some good tailwind. 2 bars of topspin should be good.

levels.name: Rookie

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a really, really hard Par 3. It's difficult to see in the picture that the fairway in front of the green slopes uphill and slopes right to left. This means you'll need to use sidespin to over adjust your shot so you always try to have a straight line for your ball when it hits the ground. Otherwise, you may find yourself in the rough. DO NOT use max backspin on this one. Use as little amount of spin as possible.

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: The typical way to play the hole. Bounce before the water to the second fairway. If you run into really bad headwind you'll have to layup before the water. For the second shot, go as close to the top as possible with no more than 6 bars of backspin. Any more than that and the ball will roll past the pin into the front rough.

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is only an option with tailwind. A driver with a lot of topspin may even be able to reach the green.

guides.text: A pretty straight forward Par 3. You should keep in mind to hit the ball directly on the green. The fairway in front of the green is sloped uphill and leads to irregular bounces so avoid it.

levels.svg: <path d="M 286 692 L 266 268" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="286" cy="692" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="266" cy="268" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: With tailwind or a long enough driver this is the way to go to get to the green in two. Roll your drive out as far as possible. From there you can either bounce your second shot over the rough in front of the green or hit directly into the rough so it will roll out to the hole. This is not an easy eagle so a birdie is NOT a bad score.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 176 817 C 309 648 309 648 357 476" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 357 476 L 363 335" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 363 335 L 126 111" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="176" cy="817" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="357" cy="476" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="363" cy="335" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="126" cy="111" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: A tough option and very difficult to reach the green in two. With headwind or sidewind, layup short and play your second shot up close to the green. You'll have a wedge left to get your eagle.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 176 817 L 312 489" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 312 489 L 165 125" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 165 125 L 115 88" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="176" cy="817" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="312" cy="489" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="165" cy="125" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="115" cy="88" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.svg: <path d="M 137 912 L 312 489" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 312 489 L 165 125" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 165 125 L 115 88" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="137" cy="912" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="312" cy="489" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="165" cy="125" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="115" cy="88" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: Play your driver straight up to give yourself a straight and open second shot to the green. When you approach the green, you will need 2 - 4 bars of backspin. This is one that you can definitely put in for an eagle. Missing left or right though can land you in a bunker.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 177 686 L 275 253" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 275 253 L 112 92" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="177" cy="686" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="275" cy="253" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="112" cy="92" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 172 736 L 275 253" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 275 253 L 112 92" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="172" cy="736" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="275" cy="253" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="112" cy="92" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.svg: <path d="M 167 787 L 275 253" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 275 253 L 112 92" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="167" cy="787" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="275" cy="253" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="112" cy="92" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: Bounce your drive over the small strip of rough. Don't use too much topspin to avoid rolling through the fairway. Hitting the green with a rough iron is much more difficult.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 177 686 L 203 240" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 203 240 L 109 98" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="177" cy="686" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="203" cy="240" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="109" cy="98" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 172 736 L 203 240" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 203 240 L 109 98" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="172" cy="736" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="203" cy="240" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="109" cy="98" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 167 787 L 203 240" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 203 240 L 109 98" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="167" cy="787" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="203" cy="240" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="109" cy="98" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: An excellent chance at a hole in one. You should hit the fairway just before the bunker to get the second bounce on the fringe. Use 2 - 2.5 bars of backspin and the ball should release right to the hole.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 123 525 L 151 202" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="123" cy="525" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="151" cy="202" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 129 610 L 151 202" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="129" cy="610" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="151" cy="202" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 135 700 L 151 202" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="135" cy="700" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="151" cy="202" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: Using a wood (Pro / Expert) or long iron (Rookie) with a lot of backspin you can take this path. You'll also need to add a bit of curl to get it close to the pin. If you closely watch the green you will see that if you bounce within 10 yards of the pin, the green will help keep your ball on the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 123 525 C 94 351 94 351 135 165" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="123" cy="525" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="135" cy="165" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 129 610 C 94 351 94 351 135 165" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="129" cy="610" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="135" cy="165" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 135 700 C 94 351 94 351 135 165" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="135" cy="700" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="135" cy="165" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a very tough par 4 with a fairway that slopes severely from right to left so you'll need to use curl and sidespin to straighten out you drive once it hits the fairway. Landing in the rough or bunker on your drive will mean you won't reach the green in 2. For you second shot, go with the Guardian if it's level 4+. Go on the right side with curl and left sidespin. Use 3 - 4 bars of backspin and use the back of the fairway to make the ball fall nicely down to the green.

levels.name: Rookie

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 361 831 C 197 539 197 539 181 381" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 181 381 L 136 292" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 136 292 C 279 191 279 191 339 85" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="361" cy="831" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="181" cy="381" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="136" cy="292" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="339" cy="85" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is the more aggressive approach. Use the fairway in front of the green and use 6 - 7 bars of backspin to keep the ball on the green. You can also go directly on the green with max backspin and let the back of the green to roll the ball back down to the pin.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 316 734 C 197 539 197 539 168 365" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 168 365 L 118 218" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 118 218 L 308 85" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="316" cy="734" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="168" cy="365" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="118" cy="218" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="308" cy="85" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 339 782 C 197 539 197 539 168 365" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 168 365 L 118 218" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 118 218 L 308 85" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="339" cy="782" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="168" cy="365" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="118" cy="218" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="308" cy="85" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 361 831 C 197 539 197 539 168 365" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 168 365 L 118 218" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 118 218 L 308 85" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="361" cy="831" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="168" cy="365" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="118" cy="218" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="308" cy="85" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is one of the toughest par 5s in the game. Not likely to reach the green in 2 without a massive tailwind. Play your drive straight ahead as close to the rough as possible and basically do the same for your second shot. Your 3rd shot will require a small amount of curl and try to aim for the back of the green. There's a slope that will feed the ball down to the pin.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 228 851 L 145 441" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 145 441 L 139 154" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 139 154 C 166 100 166 100 224 81" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="228" cy="851" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="145" cy="441" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="139" cy="154" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="224" cy="81" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 235 897 L 145 441" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 145 441 L 139 154" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 139 154 C 166 100 166 100 224 81" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="235" cy="897" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="145" cy="441" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="139" cy="154" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="224" cy="81" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 241 943 L 145 441" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 145 441 L 139 154" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 139 154 C 166 100 166 100 224 81" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="241" cy="943" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="145" cy="441" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="139" cy="154" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="224" cy="81" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: A trickier tee shot, but will give you a much better angle on your second shot to the left side of the next fairway. Landing as far left on that fairway will leave a much straighter and open shot to the green. Use the back of the green to draw the ball back down to the pin.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 228 851 L 298 419" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 298 419 L 70 232" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 70 232 C 133 112 133 112 210 78" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="228" cy="851" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="298" cy="419" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="70" cy="232" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="210" cy="78" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 235 897 L 298 419" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 298 419 L 70 232" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 70 232 C 133 112 133 112 210 78" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="235" cy="897" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="298" cy="419" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="70" cy="232" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="210" cy="78" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 241 943 L 298 419" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 298 419 L 70 232" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 70 232 C 133 112 133 112 210 78" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="241" cy="943" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="298" cy="419" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="70" cy="232" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="210" cy="78" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a Par 4 that will give you a very good chance at an eagle. Play your drive up to the end of the first fairway before the rough. From there, you'll have a short iron to the pin. But if you get tailwind, go for the green!

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 168 698 C 130 416 130 416 186 229" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 186 229 L 241 135" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="168" cy="698" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="186" cy="229" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="241" cy="135" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 178 748 C 130 416 130 416 186 229" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 186 229 L 241 135" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="178" cy="748" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="186" cy="229" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="241" cy="135" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 193 796 C 130 416 130 416 186 229" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 186 229 L 241 135" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="193" cy="796" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="186" cy="229" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="241" cy="135" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: Depending on the wind you can go for a power slice to get to the green in one. Use max overpower combined with right sidespin and right curl. Use about 2 bars of backspin. This is really only an option if you get tailwind. It's a tough shot but can help you a lot in a tournament.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 168 698 C 70 420 70 420 166 225" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 166 225 L 233 126" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="168" cy="698" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="166" cy="225" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="233" cy="126" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 178 748 C 70 420 70 420 166 225" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 166 225 L 233 126" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="178" cy="748" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="166" cy="225" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="233" cy="126" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />
