resources.title: Tour 11 Shootout - Wind Pointed at 10 O'clock

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a par 3 that will give you a decent chance at the hole in one. From the first tee you'll be playing a long iron and from the second and third tees, you'll be using a wood. Bounce before the green with 3 bars of backspin and let the ball roll up to the the pin. Aim a little left as the green slopes from left to right. If you're using the Guardian, you can use max backspin and land directly on the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 238 544 L 250 259" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="238" cy="544" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="250" cy="259" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 270 604 L 250 259" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="270" cy="604" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="250" cy="259" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 294 660 L 250 259" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="294" cy="660" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="250" cy="259" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: Put your drive in the little fairway "hole" near the bend in the fairway. Playing this way, it's very important to stay in the fairway since it can be hard to reach the green in 2 if you put your drive in the rough or bunker. The dark rough close to the fairway on the left is out of bounds so be sure to avoid it.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 122 829 L 247 368" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 247 368 L 182 117" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="122" cy="829" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="247" cy="368" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="182" cy="117" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 119 873 L 247 368" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 247 368 L 182 117" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="119" cy="873" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="247" cy="368" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="182" cy="117" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 118 916 L 247 368" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 247 368 L 182 117" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="118" cy="916" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="247" cy="368" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="182" cy="117" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: With tailwind you can take a more aggressive line. Use max overpower, max left curl and max left sidespin. If you don't have a lot of curl on your driver you can use a hook shot but you can bring the OB on the left into play. With the perfect tailwind, you can land your drive on the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 122 829 C 291 596 291 596 205 305" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 205 305 L 174 119" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="122" cy="829" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="205" cy="305" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="174" cy="119" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 119 873 C 291 596 291 596 205 305" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 205 305 L 174 119" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="119" cy="873" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="205" cy="305" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="174" cy="119" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 118 916 C 291 596 291 596 205 305" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 205 305 L 174 119" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="118" cy="916" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="205" cy="305" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="174" cy="119" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: The main approach will be to use the side of the fairway and let it bounce up to the green. The fairways on either side slope to let you bounce your ball around the bunker and up to the green. The spin is important and you should use one bar of right sidespin and 3-4 bars of backspin. If you get a left to right wind, use 1 bar of left sidespin instead. With tailwind, adjust with 4-5 bars of backspin.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 181 519 L 234 227" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 234 227 L 204 191" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="181" cy="519" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="234" cy="227" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="204" cy="191" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 193 594 L 234 227" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 234 227 L 204 191" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="193" cy="594" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="234" cy="227" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="204" cy="191" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 205 670 L 234 227" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 234 227 L 204 191" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="205" cy="670" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="234" cy="227" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="204" cy="191" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: You can also use this approach to bounce over the rough and bunker. Keep in mind that the green is elevated and you need to avoid using too much backspin. With lower winds, this may be the best approach but watch out for the fringe glitch playing this way.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 181 519 L 186 245" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 186 245 L 188 203" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="181" cy="519" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="186" cy="245" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="188" cy="203" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 193 594 L 186 245" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 186 245 L 188 203" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="193" cy="594" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="186" cy="245" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="188" cy="203" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 205 670 L 186 245" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 186 245 L 188 203" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="205" cy="670" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="186" cy="245" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="188" cy="203" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: The normal way to play the hole is to bounce your drive on the first fairway and over to the second. From there you will have a long way to the green so you'll need a wood with a lot of distance. Be aware that the trees on the right side of the fairway are in play so going too long on your drive will leave you with a more difficult second shot that will require curl. Also, leaving your approach short on the green will leave you with an impossible putt, so make sure you get it down towards the pin or leave it short for a chip.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 168 815 C 276 693 276 693 312 530" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 312 530 L 333 403" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 333 403 L 215 137" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="168" cy="815" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="312" cy="530" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="333" cy="403" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="215" cy="137" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 150 862 C 276 693 276 693 312 530" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 312 530 L 333 403" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 333 403 L 215 137" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="150" cy="862" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="312" cy="530" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="333" cy="403" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="215" cy="137" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 125 906 C 276 693 276 693 312 530" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 312 530 L 333 403" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 333 403 L 215 137" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="125" cy="906" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="312" cy="530" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="333" cy="403" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="215" cy="137" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This path is only an option if you get tailwind for your first shot and you're playing from one of the front 2 tees. Use some backspin to avoid running through the fairway. Your approach will be the same as the black path.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 168 815 C 310 690 310 690 343 459" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 343 459 L 204 139" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="168" cy="815" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="343" cy="459" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="204" cy="139" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 150 862 C 310 690 310 690 343 459" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 343 459 L 204 139" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="150" cy="862" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="343" cy="459" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="204" cy="139" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 125 906 C 310 690 310 690 343 459" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 343 459 L 204 139" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="125" cy="906" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="343" cy="459" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="204" cy="139" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

resources.title: Tour 7 - Layup Technique Strategy for Success

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is an option in any situation except headwind. You'll need to either play way out to the right or long enough to take the trees out of play on your second shot. With the trees out of the way, you'll have a great chance for an eagle.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 146 563 L 181 108" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 181 108 L 109 131" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="146" cy="563" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="181" cy="108" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="109" cy="131" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 148 611 L 181 108" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 181 108 L 109 131" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="148" cy="611" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="181" cy="108" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="109" cy="131" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 150 660 L 181 108" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 181 108 L 109 131" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="150" cy="660" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="181" cy="108" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="109" cy="131" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is a good way to play with the exception of a strong left to right wind. Use 3-4 bars of backspin, max left sidespin and full left curl. Land your drive on the small fairway and you'll be left with a perfect shot at eagle on your second shot.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 146 563 C 141 387 141 387 105 259" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 105 259 L 85 215" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 85 215 L 93 161" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="146" cy="563" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="105" cy="259" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="85" cy="215" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="93" cy="161" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 148 611 C 141 387 141 387 105 259" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 105 259 L 85 215" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 85 215 L 93 161" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="148" cy="611" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="105" cy="259" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="85" cy="215" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="93" cy="161" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 150 660 C 141 387 141 387 105 259" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 105 259 L 85 215" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 85 215 L 93 161" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="150" cy="660" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="105" cy="259" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="85" cy="215" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="93" cy="161" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: Blue Path
guides.text: With tailwind you should try to go for the green. Use the small left fairway to bounce over the bunker and to the green. Even if you land in the bunker, you'll have a great chance for the eagle. To make this play perfect, you should make the second bounce on the rough just over the bunker.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 146 563 C 57 353 57 353 75 251" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 75 251 L 89 159" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="146" cy="563" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="75" cy="251" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="89" cy="159" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 148 611 C 57 353 57 353 75 251" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 75 251 L 89 159" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="148" cy="611" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="75" cy="251" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="89" cy="159" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 150 660 C 57 353 57 353 75 251" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 75 251 L 89 159" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="150" cy="660" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="75" cy="251" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="89" cy="159" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the best and safer way to play. If you get some right to left wind, don't forget to use a little bit of right sidespin to straighten out when you hit the fairway. Just to the left of the pin, the green slope severely down. Better to stay safe on the right side of the green than having a hard putt for your birdie.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 154 523 L 256 215" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 256 215 L 262 168" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="154" cy="523" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="256" cy="215" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="262" cy="168" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 155 609 L 256 215" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 256 215 L 262 168" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="155" cy="609" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="256" cy="215" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="262" cy="168" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 156 697 L 256 215" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 256 215 L 262 168" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="156" cy="697" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="256" cy="215" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="262" cy="168" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This may seem like an easier way to play the hole, but you will have a really hard time getting the ball to the pin. You'll need to use a lot of topspin to get the ball up onto the green. If you land short on the green, you'll have a very tough uphill putt for the birdie. Better to stay on the fringe for the chip.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 154 523 C 124 329 124 329 168 150" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 168 150 C 175 96 244 95 248 128" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="154" cy="523" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="168" cy="150" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="248" cy="128" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 155 609 C 124 329 124 329 168 150" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 168 150 C 175 96 244 95 248 128" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="155" cy="609" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="168" cy="150" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="248" cy="128" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 156 697 C 124 329 124 329 168 150" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 168 150 C 175 96 244 95 248 128" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="156" cy="697" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="168" cy="150" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="248" cy="128" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: A very tough par 4 that requires you to put your drive in the fairway or you'll have a hard time making the green in two. Without tailwind, go short and use a Big Dawg or Cataclysm to get to the green on your second shot. Use 5-6 bars of backspin and bounce over the water to the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 228 677 L 160 342" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 160 342 L 210 81" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="228" cy="677" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="160" cy="342" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="210" cy="81" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 237 726 L 160 342" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 160 342 L 210 81" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="237" cy="726" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="160" cy="342" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="210" cy="81" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 246 776 L 160 342" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 160 342 L 210 81" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="246" cy="776" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="160" cy="342" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="210" cy="81" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is only really an option with a left to right wind or a tailwind. Go directly to the second fairway on the right. From there, you'll have a long iron to the green which you can bounce over the water or land directly on the green (which will require a lot of backspin to hold.)

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 228 677 L 183 241" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 183 241 L 216 80" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="228" cy="677" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="183" cy="241" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="216" cy="80" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 237 726 L 183 241" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 183 241 L 216 80" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="237" cy="726" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="183" cy="241" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="216" cy="80" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 246 776 L 183 241" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 183 241 L 216 80" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="246" cy="776" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="183" cy="241" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="216" cy="80" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Blue Path
guides.text: With a right to left wind you can play up the left fairway. Keep in mind that the trees along the water are in play so you need to setup your second shot in a place where they won't block you out. You can also curl around them. This is a hard line to make an eagle from.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 228 677 L 82 251" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 82 251 L 201 76" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="228" cy="677" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="82" cy="251" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="201" cy="76" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 237 726 L 82 251" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 82 251 L 201 76" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="237" cy="726" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="82" cy="251" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="201" cy="76" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 246 776 L 82 251" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 82 251 L 201 76" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="246" cy="776" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="82" cy="251" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="201" cy="76" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: You need to place you drive on the left side of the fairway. ALL trees are in play which means that you can't go over them. You'll need to curl around so use a driver with a lot of curl comined with a ball with distance and sidespin. Don't forget to use some backspin and NOT topspin. For the second shot, you need a wood with distance and curl. You should be able to bounce before the rough over to the green. You can use the right side of the green to make the ball fall down to the left. If you make an eagle, BE HAPPY.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 134 750 C 209 608 209 608 182 444" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 182 444 L 161 326" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 161 326 C 143 220 143 220 183 109" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="134" cy="750" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="182" cy="444" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="161" cy="326" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="183" cy="109" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 132 796 C 209 608 209 608 182 444" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 182 444 L 161 326" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 161 326 C 143 220 143 220 183 109" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="132" cy="796" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="182" cy="444" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="161" cy="326" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="183" cy="109" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 129 844 C 209 608 209 608 182 444" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 182 444 L 161 326" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 161 326 C 143 220 143 220 183 109" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="129" cy="844" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="182" cy="444" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="161" cy="326" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="183" cy="109" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: If you get some tailwind, you can use left curl and max overpower to bounce at the end of the first fairway and hop over to the second. From there you'll have an open shot to the green and a possible albatross. You can land your approach on the green or bounce over the rough onto the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 134 750 C 206 512 206 512 151 331" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 151 331 L 121 253" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 121 253 L 178 108" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="134" cy="750" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="151" cy="331" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="121" cy="253" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="178" cy="108" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 132 796 C 206 512 206 512 151 331" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 151 331 L 121 253" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 121 253 L 178 108" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="132" cy="796" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="151" cy="331" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="121" cy="253" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="178" cy="108" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 129 844 C 206 512 206 512 151 331" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 151 331 L 121 253" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 121 253 L 178 108" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="129" cy="844" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="151" cy="331" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="121" cy="253" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="178" cy="108" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: Blue Path
guides.text: This approach only applies IF you don't have the possibility to reach the green on your second shot. You can play your second shot up to the left and leave a decent chance to chip it in for an eagle.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 134 750 C 209 608 209 608 176 444" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 176 444 L 156 326" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 156 326 L 128 93" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="134" cy="750" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="176" cy="444" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="156" cy="326" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="128" cy="93" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 132 796 C 209 608 209 608 176 444" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 176 444 L 156 326" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 156 326 L 128 93" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="132" cy="796" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="176" cy="444" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="156" cy="326" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="128" cy="93" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 129 844 C 209 608 209 608 176 444" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 176 444 L 156 326" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 156 326 L 128 93" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="129" cy="844" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="176" cy="444" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="156" cy="326" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="128" cy="93" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

resources.title: Tour 7 - Going for the green with Rock

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: Without tailwind, this is the only way to play the hole. Layup with the drive. The key will be your second shot into the green. With your long iron, aim a little more left of the pin then you normally would, as the ball will fall down to the left. Use 4-6 bars of backspin and use the slope on the green to let it fall down to the hole. Also have in mind that with a downhill chip around the green, the ball will be affected more by the wind.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 118 690 L 247 277" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 247 277 L 165 116" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="118" cy="690" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="247" cy="277" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="165" cy="116" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 100 744 L 247 277" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 247 277 L 165 116" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="100" cy="744" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="247" cy="277" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="165" cy="116" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 82 797 L 247 277" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 247 277 L 165 116" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="82" cy="797" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="247" cy="277" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="165" cy="116" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: With tailwind, you should get aggressive and go for the green. From the first and second tees you can use a hook shot or a regular drive with full left spin and left curl. Use 5 bars of topspin for your drive since a tailwind will give your ball a big boost, and can go over the green with too much topspin.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 118 690 C 200 435 200 435 182 266" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 182 266 L 157 112" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="118" cy="690" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="182" cy="266" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="157" cy="112" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 100 744 C 200 435 200 435 182 266" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 182 266 L 157 112" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="100" cy="744" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="182" cy="266" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="157" cy="112" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.svg: <path d="M 82 797 C 200 435 200 435 182 266" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 182 266 L 157 112" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="82" cy="797" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="182" cy="266" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="157" cy="112" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

resources.title: Tour 7 Shootout - Small Wind Pointed at 12 O'clock

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: A hole where you NEED to give yourself a chance at the hole in one. From the first tee, use a long iron with plenty of backspin. Land your first bounce directly on the green and aim slightly above the pin. From the second tee, use Guardian with max backspin. Aim just after the pin and let the ball slide down to the hole.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 234 577 L 240 200" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="234" cy="577" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="240" cy="200" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 232 660 L 240 200" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="232" cy="660" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="240" cy="200" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 230 747 L 240 200" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="230" cy="747" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="240" cy="200" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: The most common way to play the hole. Use the driver with the most length and use a lot of curl to leave yourself with a short iron or wedge for your second shot. If you don't have a lot of curl on your driver, put your drive just in front of the second bunker on the left. The trees will be a little more in play for your second shot, but still a good chance at the albatross.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 191 838 C 142 500 142 500 263 290" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 263 290 L 272 138" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="191" cy="838" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="263" cy="290" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="272" cy="138" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 184 887 C 142 500 142 500 263 290" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 263 290 L 272 138" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="184" cy="887" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="263" cy="290" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="272" cy="138" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 176 940 C 142 500 142 500 263 290" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 263 290 L 272 138" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="176" cy="940" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="263" cy="290" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="272" cy="138" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is a more conservative approach and is more common playing from the 1st or 3rd tees. Bounce over the bunker with max topspin and you'll have a wood into the green for your second shot. If you're facing headwind, you'll need a wood with plenty of distance to reach the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 191 838 L 191 537" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 191 537 L 195 382" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 195 382 L 263 137" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="191" cy="838" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="191" cy="537" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="195" cy="382" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="263" cy="137" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 184 887 L 195 382" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 191 537 L 195 382" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 195 382 L 263 137" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="184" cy="887" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="191" cy="537" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="195" cy="382" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="263" cy="137" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.svg: <path d="M 176 940 L 195 382" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 191 537 L 195 382" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 195 382 L 263 137" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="176" cy="940" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="191" cy="537" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="195" cy="382" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="263" cy="137" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

resources.title: Tour 7 - Shootout - Wind Pointed at 10 O'clock

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a deceptively tough par 3. The reason is that the bounces you'll get are very irregular and can send your tee shot in all kinds of directions. Try not to aim in the front of the fairway because it's the worst place. Use 2-3 bars of backspin depending on the wind. The entire hole is uphill so keep that in mind. If you want to take the safe way with the risk of the bounce, this is the way to go.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 199 536 L 178 218" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="199" cy="536" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="178" cy="218" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 195 608 L 178 218" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="195" cy="608" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="178" cy="218" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 192 683 L 178 218" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="192" cy="683" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="178" cy="218" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is the preferred approach. Use 4 bars of backspin with sidewind and tailwind. With headwind, use 3.5 bars. This landing area is flatter and will give you a better bounce to the pin. The fairway spot is small and not easy to hit, but can lead to a better result if you pull it off. With a right to left wind, use 1 bar of sidespin to counter.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 199 536 L 217 224" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 217 224 L 201 166" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="199" cy="536" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="217" cy="224" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="201" cy="166" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 195 608 L 217 224" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 217 224 L 201 166" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="195" cy="608" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="217" cy="224" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="201" cy="166" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 192 683 L 217 224" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 217 224 L 201 166" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="192" cy="683" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="217" cy="224" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="201" cy="166" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This path shows two variations. With headwind, put your drive as close to the end of the first fairway as possible. From there, play a wood with plenty of distance, bouncing over the next patch of rough and leave yourself with a wedge for the eagle. If you get sidewind though, you can overpower your shot with max topspin and bounce over to the next fairway. The second shot will be either a wood or long iron.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 198 842 L 227 473" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 227 473 L 238 305" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 238 305 L 208 133" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="198" cy="842" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="227" cy="473" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="238" cy="305" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="208" cy="133" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 198 893 L 227 473" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 227 473 L 238 305" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 238 305 L 208 133" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="198" cy="893" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="227" cy="473" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="238" cy="305" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="208" cy="133" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 198 945 L 227 473" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 227 473 L 238 305" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 238 305 L 208 133" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="198" cy="945" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="227" cy="473" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="238" cy="305" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="208" cy="133" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: With sidewind or tailwind, you can bounce your drive over to the island on the left. The island is shaped like a bowl so it will keep the ball in play quite easily. For the second shot, you'll need a wood with a lot of distance to carry the rough and get to the green in two.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 198 842 L 144 487" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 144 487 L 106 376" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 106 376 L 197 135" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="198" cy="842" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="144" cy="487" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="106" cy="376" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="197" cy="135" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 198 893 L 144 487" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 144 487 L 106 376" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 106 376 L 197 135" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="198" cy="893" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="144" cy="487" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="106" cy="376" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="197" cy="135" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 198 945 L 144 487" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 144 487 L 106 376" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 106 376 L 197 135" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="198" cy="945" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="144" cy="487" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="106" cy="376" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="197" cy="135" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: Blue Path
guides.text: With tailwind you can go directly to the second fairway with topspin and leave yourself with a long iron to the green. You'll need to use a Berserker or Snow Globe to pull this shot off.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 198 842 L 259 269" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 259 269 L 212 129" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="198" cy="842" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="259" cy="269" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="212" cy="129" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This hole is as tricky as it seems. It's a BIG NO-NO to be among the trees on the left side. They will keep you from reaching the green in 2. Use the topspin on your drive and thread it through left gap. The second shot will be uphill and so won't be as affected by the wind as much. From the front tee, use the Quarterback to give yourself more control with accuracy and ball guide.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 152 639 L 157 249" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 157 249 L 157 131" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="152" cy="639" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="157" cy="249" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="157" cy="131" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 150 690 L 157 249" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 157 249 L 157 131" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="150" cy="690" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="157" cy="249" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="157" cy="131" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 149 743 L 157 249" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 157 249 L 157 131" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="149" cy="743" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="157" cy="249" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="157" cy="131" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is an uncommon way to approach the hole but with a right to left wind, this can be a better play. Don't use too much topspin or you may run into the trees on the right. Use a ball with plenty of sidespin to get your ball to roll out to the left. This will leave you with a wedge into the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 152 639 L 217 240" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 217 240 C 224 190 224 190 205 141" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="152" cy="639" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="217" cy="240" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="205" cy="141" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 150 690 L 217 240" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 217 240 C 224 190 224 190 205 141" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="150" cy="690" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="217" cy="240" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="205" cy="141" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 149 743 L 217 240" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 217 240 C 224 190 224 190 205 141" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="149" cy="743" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="217" cy="240" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="205" cy="141" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Yellow Path
guides.text: If you get headwind you can play your teeshot short and go into the green with a wood. Be sure not to place your drive too far up and close to the trees or you won't be able to clear them on your second shot.

levels.svg: <path d="M 150 690 L 168 356" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 168 356 C 164 203 164 203 203 89" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="150" cy="690" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="168" cy="356" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="203" cy="89" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.svg: <path d="M 149 743 L 168 356" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 168 356 C 164 203 164 203 203 89" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="149" cy="743" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="168" cy="356" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="203" cy="89" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

resources.title: Tour 10 - Shootout - Headwind Pointed at 4 O'clock
Tour 7 Shootout - Wind Pointed at 2 O'Clock

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: There is only one way to play this hole. From the second and third tees, you'll be hitting your driver and from the first tee, you'll be using a wood. Aim in the middle of the fairway with 2 bars of backspin. The further back you aim, the less backspin you'll need. With cross wind, you'll need to use some side spin to counter the bounce. With too much backspin, you'll end up short with a very tough putt or wedge shot.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 130 549 L 143 184" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="130" cy="549" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="143" cy="184" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 135 617 L 143 184" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="135" cy="617" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="143" cy="184" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 141 688 L 143 184" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="141" cy="688" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="143" cy="184" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a short but fun par 4 that will push you to the limit. The black path is an aggressive line and can potentially get you to the green in 1. You need a perfect bounce with at least 5 bars of topspin on the first fairway platform. The second bounce needs to be just before the green side bunker. If the ball lands in the rough just before the green, it will roll out nicely and leave you with a short putt for eagle. But this is definitely a HARD shot to pull off.

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is the safer way to the play the hole. Play your drive out as far as possible and get as close to the rough as possible. From there, you'll have either a long or short iron to the green. Be sure to put clubs in your bag with a lot of backspin since the green is very shallow coming in from this angle. That also applies to the sand wedge and rough iron as well.

resources.title: Tour 7 - Tips and Strategy Using 2nd Fairway Drive

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a tough par 5 where you can't afford to go into the rough with your drive. Use the max amount of curl with your driver combined with left side spin. Bounce up as close to the end of the fairway as possible. From there, you'll need a wood with a lot of distance. The fairway leading to the green is very small and you'll need to just let the ball roll onto the green. Don't use too much right spin which can land you in the bunker as the fairway does slope a little to the right. The green is shaped like a bowl so you can come in a little hot and it will still funnel towards the hole.

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: With tailwind you can try to get your drive over to the second fairway. Use 1 bar of backspin and land nicely for a shorter wood shot to the green. From this position you'll be able to use whichever wood you want but Guardian will make it easy to stick it on the green and get the putt for eagle.

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: You'll be able to reach the green from anywhere here unless you find the short bunker. Play your drive up so you can get an open shot to the green. A GREAT possibility to chip it in for an eagle.

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: With good tailwind you can play this way. Bounce your drive on the small fairway with A LOT of topspin and with a little luck you'll get over the bunker and roll onto the green. Be aware of the water which comes into play if you hit a bad drive.

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: The normal way to play the hole. Don't overpower your drive if you don't have to. The most important thing is to stay in the fairway so you can reach the green in two. If you avoid the rough and bunkers you should be fine.

guides.name: Yellow Path
guides.text: A tougher option that requires good tailwind to reach the right fairway. If you can pull it off, you'll have an easier chance at the pin with a long iron.

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the most popular way to play the hole. Be precise with your adjustment or you'll end up in the rough or more likely the bunker. It's a pretty good shot a hole in one.

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: Recommended if you have a wood with really good backspin (e.g. The Guardian). This is also a good way to play if you get some tricky wind and hitting the small fairway island isn't easy. Using curl, sidespin and backspin you can definitely get this one close.

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is typically how you should play this hole. Bounce over the rough and over to the second fairway. Don't use any more than 4 bars of topsin or you'll risk running through the fairway into the rough or bunker in which case you won't be able to reach the green in 2. With a tailwind don't use any more than 3 bars of topspin. You'll have a wood into the green. Use some right sidespin on your approach to avoid the rough and greenside bunker.

guides.text: This is a possibility when you get a powerful left to right wind with some tail wind. If you have some curl on your driver you can put your drive close to the marker in the picture. The second shot is definitely harder from this position.

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the common way to play the hole. Get as far out as possible. It's very important to get beyond the trees to have a clear second shot into the green. The more the trees come into play, the more curl you'll need to use on your second shot. If you have a left to right wind, make sure to not use max right spin on your approach otherwise you'll risk falling down the right slope and leave yourself with a very difficult chip.

levels.svg: <path d="M 310 854 C 176 512 176 512 149 237" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 149 237 L 341 119" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="310" cy="854" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="149" cy="237" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="341" cy="119" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: A very aggresive way to play the hole that REQUIRES tailwind and a driver with a lot of topspin. You'll need at least 14mph in tailwind and 6-7 of topspin on your driver. Bounce your shot in the rough on the far side of the lake to place yourself for a short chip.

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a very tricky par 3. This approach is the most common way to play the hole. You need both curl and sidespin to pull this one off. With driver use 2 bars of backspin and with a wood use 0.5 bars.

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is probably the easiest way get a hole in one, and is probably the best way to play the hole with a left to right wind. Use a couple bars of right sidespin and 2 bars of backspin with a driver. With a wood, use topspin instead.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 226 736 C 306 476 306 476 285 315" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 285 315 L 279 210" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="226" cy="736" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="285" cy="315" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="279" cy="210" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Blue Path
guides.text: This is an option with a driver with at least 70 in backspin. You can land directly on the green and take the bunkers out of play. With tailwind, you'll want a driver with at least 80 in backspin.

resources.title: Tour 11 - Tips for an Easy Pitch

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the most common way to play the hole. The fairway slopes down to the right so be sure to stay away from the rough and bunker. Be sure to have a wood with a lot of curl. Use full backspin, left sidewind and left curl. This is one of the most difficult second shots in the game so don't get discouraged if you miss it.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 203 844 L 156 293" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 156 293 C 233 199 233 199 209 93" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="203" cy="844" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="156" cy="293" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="209" cy="93" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 206 901 L 156 293" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 156 293 C 233 199 233 199 209 93" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="206" cy="901" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="156" cy="293" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="209" cy="93" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: With a left to right tail wind this is an option. Use a good amount of right curl and right sidespin along with max topspin. That will leave you with an "easy" wood shot into the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 203 844 C 199 593 199 593 264 448" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 264 448 L 329 299" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 329 299 L 219 85" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="203" cy="844" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="264" cy="448" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="329" cy="299" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="219" cy="85" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 206 901 C 199 593 199 593 264 448" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 264 448 L 329 299" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 329 299 L 219 85" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="206" cy="901" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="264" cy="448" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="329" cy="299" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="219" cy="85" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 209 959 C 199 593 199 593 264 448" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 264 448 L 329 299" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 329 299 L 219 85" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="209" cy="959" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="264" cy="448" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="329" cy="299" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="219" cy="85" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: Blue Path
guides.text: The tee shot is the same as the black path but with a left to right wind, it may not be possible to get the needed curl for the second shot shown in the black path. Here, you use 5-7 bars of topspin with max right sidespin and use the rough patch between the bunkers to get the ball up onto the green.

levels.svg: <path d="M 203 844 L 145 293" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 145 293 L 194 85" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="203" cy="844" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="145" cy="293" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="194" cy="85" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the most common way to play the hole. Lay up as close to the rough on the left as possible. From there, you'll need a wood with good accuracy and ball guide. It's important to keep your second shot out of the rough and bunkers. That will leave you with an easy approach to the green.

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: With a tailwind you can go ALL IN. Carry the bunker with your drive and leave your ball close to the 2nd black mark. From there, or even shorter, you can get to the green in two. You'll need a wood with good distance to reach.

guides.name: Blue/Orange Path
guides.text: This is a somewhat less common route. Play your drive up as close to the rough on the right as possible. From there, depending on the wind, you can choose to either continue up the right fairway or cross over the water. If you opt to go right, you'll need a wood with a lot of distance as the shot is LOOONG.
